title: 7.14 dropped me from 140FPS to 60FPS
body:
Ever since this patch was installed I dropped more than 50% FPS, I have no idea what would cause this.

I used to play at a regular 140FPS now I'm at 60FPS.

Please address this.

replies.body: Some of your game files may have corrupted during the update, or it could also be outdated drivers.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up and test it in a custom game.  That should do it!
